message.content:
cs.PL, cs.AR, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.CR 

Reasoning: 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages): The paper proposes a generic framework for modelling weak memory and discusses specific instantiations for different programming languages. 
- cs.AR (Architecture): The paper discusses the behaviour of different memory models on different architectures, including ARM and Power. 
- cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science): The paper presents an axiomatic framework for modelling weak memory and discusses its equivalence to an operational model. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper presents a new simulation tool (herd) and a new analysis tool (mole) for exploring weak memory idioms in code. 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): Although not a major focus of the paper, the discussion of weak memory models and their implications for program correctness and security could potentially fall under this category.
